publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4289 Murdo Fraser: Autism Treatment Trust’s Treatment Consultation Centre—That the Parliament congratulates the charity, Autism Treatment Trust, on the opening of Europe’s first "autism specific" treatment consultation centre, which is based in Edinburgh; notes that the new treatment consultation centre is specifically designed to give access to biomedical testing, treatment and complementary advice on education and behavioural matters involving autistic children, and believes that the centre will help in the understanding and treatment of the condition. R
S2M-4289 Autism Treatment Trust’s Treatment Consultation Centre (lodged on 25 April 2006) Mr David Davidson*, Mike Pringle*, Chris Ballance*, Mr Dave Petrie*, Mr Ted Brocklebank*, Bruce Crawford*

S2M-4289 Autism Treatment Trust’s Treatment Consultation Centre (lodged on 25 April 2006) Shiona Baird*, Alex Fergusson*, Phil Gallie*, Patrick Harvie*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Alex Neil*, Tommy Sheridan*, Murray Tosh*, Dr Jean Turner*, Mr Jim Wallace*, Ms Maureen Watt*, Christine Grahame*, Fiona Hyslop*, Carolyn Leckie*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Donald Gorrie*, Bill Aitken*

S2M-4289 Murdo Fraser: Autism Treatment Trust’s Treatment Consultation Centre—That the Parliament congratulates the charity, Autism Treatment Trust, on the opening of Europe’s first "autism specific" treatment consultation centre, which is based in Edinburgh; notes that the new treatment consultation centre is specifically designed to give access to biomedical testing, treatment and complementary advice on education and behavioural matters involving autistic children, and believes that the centre will help in the understanding and treatment of the condition. R Supported by: Mr David Davidson, Mike Pringle, Chris Ballance, Mr Dave Petrie, Mr Ted Brocklebank, Bruce Crawford, Shiona Baird, Alex Fergusson, Phil Gallie, Patrick Harvie, Mr Adam Ingram, Alex Neil, Tommy Sheridan, Murray Tosh, Dr Jean Turner, Mr Jim Wallace, Ms Maureen Watt, Christine Grahame, Fiona Hyslop, Carolyn Leckie, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Donald Gorrie, Bill Aitken, Margaret Mitchell*, Mrs Nanette Milne*
S2M-4289 Autism Treatment Trust’s Treatment Consultation Centre (lodged on 25 April 2006) Robin Harper*, Dennis Canavan*, Mr Brian Monteith*
S2M-4289 Autism Treatment Trust’s Treatment Consultation Centre (lodged on 25 April 2006) Linda Fabiani*
S2M-4289 Autism Treatment Trust’s Treatment Consultation Centre (lodged on 25 April 2006) Marilyn Livingstone*
